text:
Question 164) About 20 million Brazilians live in the region covered by Caatinga, in almost 800,000 km2 of area. When it does not rain, the sert√£o man and his family need to walk miles in search of water from the dams. Climate irregularity is one of the factors that most interfere with the countryman's life.
According to this survey, the demographic density of the region covered by the caatinga, in inhabitants by km2, is
A) 250.
B) 25.
C) 2.5.
D) 0.25.
E) 0.025.
